data.title: Era School Reunion
data.text:
All those teachers, students and assorted stragglers you'd probably rather forget.

This list of Era-ites has been constructed from memory by members of the Era community.

As well as students and teachers it lists some parents and others who were either frequently at the school or made some kind of special contribution. That being subjective, we have erred on the side of inclusiveness.

If someone isn't on the list who should be it's just an oversight and they will be added upon request. Any assistance with improving the completeness of this list is appreciated.

If a name appears to be missing, check that you are looking up the surname the person had whilst at Era, as name changes are common.

For corrections and additions contact Guy West

You can also contact Guy to be sent a comprehensive Era database in Excel format.
